title: Gram - tense - accessit - Juan Latino Epigrammatum

content.description:
Optata accessit, saeclis labentibus, aetas 
volvitur haec praesenspraesens, -ntis, adj.: present; gloria dicta venit.
content.question: In the passage, the tense of the verb accessit indicates that “the desired age” (optata aetas)

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
